Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.model

Class FieldFormat

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.model.FieldFormat
public class FieldFormat
extends java.lang.Object

This class describes format string associated with any model entity.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.4

  • Constructor Details

    • FieldFormat

      public FieldFormat​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Constructor of the class. Build default format for the given class

      Parameters:
      clazz - class to build format for. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - class is null

    • FieldFormat

      public FieldFormat​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.String format) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Constructor of the class. Build format for the given class and given format string. Format string can be (in BNC):

      <format> ::= [<mask>]<lengthAndFrac>[<options>]
      <mask> ::= '('<MaskFormatter mask>')'
      <lengthAndFrac> ::= <length>['.'<frac>]
      <length> ::= <number>
      <frac> ::= <number>
      <options> ::= <option>[<options>]
      <option> ::= {'r'|'R'|'l'|'L'|'m'|'n'|'N'|'o'|'z'|'p'|'s'|'<'|'>'|'<>'|'><'}

      Option codes are:

      • r - field is read-only
      • R - field is read-only except new and duplicated records
      • l - field must be appear in the search list and/or table
      • L - field must be appear in the search list and/or table and must be anchored in it
      • m - field is mandatory to input
      • n - negative field value must be marked
      • N - field accepts null as value
      • o - field is output only (will be read-only and will not catch focus)
      • z - zero field value must be marked
      • z - positive field value must be marked
      • s - all content of the field must be selected when control gets focus
      • < - field is left-aligned
      • > - field is right-aligned
      • <> - field is adjusted
      • >< - field is center-aligned
      Parameters:
      clazz - class to build format for. Can't be null
      format - format string. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - any parameters are null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - illegal syntax in the format string
